fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Freeze two players at night. They will be roleblocked and given Basic defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock immunity
- If this role spawns, a (3977) Fire Lizard must spawn.
- If you visit a (3977) Fire Lizard, you will be notified.
- You can only be killed by Basic attacks.
- If all (3977) Fire Lizards die, you will deal a Basic attack instead of giving defense and gain an NK win condition.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive until the end of the game.
